content: HCT Anchor coils Economical, multiple-use replacement coils for reusing HCA coil anchors in a new drill hole ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Simple accessory that allows the HCA anchor to be reused in a new drill hole Prolongs the usable lifespan of coil anchors Applications Fastening braces to support tilt-up and formwork Fixing non-specified, temporary fastenings ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Head configuration: N/A Base materials: Concrete (uncracked) Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Head configuration | N/A | Base materials | Concrete (uncracked) | Reusable (and removable) | Not Possible | Cleaning procedures | N/A | PROFIS Software | No | Installation direction | All | Material composition | Steel, zinc-plated (min. 5 Âµm) ### ITEMS- 255988 - Coil anchor tang HCT 1/2 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HCA 1/2 Coil - 339641 - Coil anchor tang HCT 1/2 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2000x HCA 1/2 Coil - 255990 - Coil anchor tang HCT 3/4 - Package Size 50 pc Package Contents: - 1x HCA 3/4 Coil - 339643 - Coil anchor tang HCT 3/4 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x HCA 3/4 Coil - 255987 - Coil anchor tang HCT 3/8 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HCA 3/8 Coil - 339640 - Coil anchor tang HCT 3/8 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2500x HCA 3/8 Coil - 255989 - Coil anchor tang HCT 5/8 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HCA 5/8 Coil - 339642 - Coil anchor tang HCT 5/8 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1500x HCA 5/8 Coil
